Standard Operating Procedure
Access Control, User-id & Password
Management
Document Title
SOP- Access Control ,User-id & Password Management
Description
Secure management(accountability and traceability) of user
access rights and user-id , password
Created By
Divya Rakesh
Created Date
1-03-2017
Approved By
Abhijeet Shingate
Occurrence
Frequency
User rights review - 6 months
Version Number
Revisions Made Description
Revised
By
Revision
Date
Status
![](data:image/png;base64,)
Purpose:
To ensure management of user access rights along with user-id for
accountability, traceability of
accesses either granted, revoked, transferred ;for all entities in the
scope of ISMS.
Also define a standard procedure for password maintenance (for
non-administrative users) such as
resetting of password. This procedure also applies to non-windows access
including website, web portal
access and cloud systems access
SOP Owner
Request Approver
Request performer
CISO
CISO
IT System Administration Team
HR head
IT System Administration head
CISO
Frequency:
• Review of user access rights - once in 6 months
Checklist of access (equipment ,data, networks, etc):
• laptop / desktop / MAC / mobile devices / RFID card
• company domain email address
• Wi-fi / LAN / VPN
• applications / management tools
• database / test data / data
Procedure:
New User Access Creation
Rights Provisioning
Review of user access rights
Removal of access rights (De-Registration)
Resetting the Password
Output:
All records shall be stored in email or trouble ticket system. Upon each
request of any kind, a trouble
ticket shall be created, and prior to closing it, all the relevant
details of the work performed shall be
input in the ticket details.
Note:
• Each new ordinary access grant request will be 'least privilege
based'.
• Calendar will be set to revoke temporary access rights.
• Access credentials to critical assets(physical, logical, self owned,
external)will be maintained in
list.
• For doubts and questions in terms of executing this procedure, IT
department shall be referred.

[](#pf3)
[](#pf3)
[](#pf4)
[](#pf4)

New User Access Creation
Process Task
Action (if Yes)
Action (if Not)
Task Owner
Is there any new joining
reported by HR formally?
Get Employee Details
Wait for the formal
data/details from HR
about the new joinee.
IT System administration
Team
Is the User ID Created
according to IT policies?
Securely send
credentials to new
user.
Follow Policy document,
password policy. This
SOP notes
IT System administration
Team
Is a redundant (active but
un-used) user ID issued to
the requester?
Delete the redundant
user ID, and assign a
fresh new user ID to
the requester.
Securely send
credentials to new user.
IT System administration
Team
Changing the existing access rights as per request
Process Task
Action (If yes)
Action (if no)
Task Owner
Is a formal request in place
for user rights
provisioning?
Proceed
Ensure that a formal
request is in place
IT System administration
Team
Is the request being made
for some other user ID than
the requesters own?
Have the requester
obtained approval from
the senior management
of the user whose
access levels are asked
to be changed.
Also inform IT Head.
Proceed
IT System administration
Team
Is least privileged access
ensured?
Proceed
Follow Least Privileged
Access best practice
IT System administration
Team
Are the rights conflicting,
resulting into more than
required privileges?
Follow Least Privileged
Access best practice
Proceed
IT System administration
Team
Is the request tracked via
an email or trouble ticket?
End Task
Mark the requested
change in the trouble
ticket and close the ticket
by informing to
stakeholders
IT System administration
Team
Review of user access rights
Process Task
Action (If yes)
Action(if no)
Task Owner
Are all user IDs' access
levels reviewed in last six
months?
Record the findings in
email or ticket. Task
ends
Review the all user IDs' list
and Proceed
IT System administration
Team
Is a dormant or disabled
user found?
Remove the user ID
Proceed
IT System administration
Team
Is business risk-critical
access levels found?
Inform senior
authorities & CISO. Also,
situation should be
Proceed
IT System administration
Team
![](data:image/png;base64,)
treated as an
information security
incident.
Are all the non-compliant
findings recorded?
Task Ends
Issue a self-trouble ticket
to record the task and in
the details mention all the
non-compliance findings.
IT System administration
Team
Removal of access rights (De-Registration)
Process Task
Action (If yes)
Action (if no)
Task Owner
Is a formal request received
from HR to remove
access/disable ID?
Get Employee Details
Wait for the formal
data/details from HR.
IT System administration
Team
Is this request originating
from HR's employee
termination or disciplinary
action?
Inform IT Head
Proceed
IT System administration
Team
Are all required details
obtained to proceed?
Proceed
Wait until all required
details are received
IT System administration
Team
Is the access revoking / ID
deletion performed?
Formally inform HR and
IT Head
Ensure that the requested
task is performed
IT System administration
Team
Resetting up the Password
Process Task
Action (If yes)
Action (if no)
Task Owner
Is the password being reset
for critical infrastructure
components? E.g.
Domain admin
Local admin on non-domain
server
Firewall admin interface
Switch or Router interface
Perform password change
operation and continue to
Secret Key Management
Procedure
Proceed
IT System administration
Team
Is a formal request in place by
the requester to reset their
password?
Proceed
Get a formal request
in place from the
requester in the
form of a trouble
ticket
IT System administration
Team
Is the password reset being
asked by requester for
another user's user-id?
Escalate to IT head. Have
the requester obtain
approval from the
management of that user
whose password needs to
be reset. Proceed upon
receiving that approval.
Proceed
IT System administration
Team
![](data:image/png;base64,)
Is password reset action
completed?
Inform respective user
and their senior
management about action
completion and close the
trouble ticket.
Ensure completion
of the request.
IT System administration
Team
